ComicInfo.Title: Flavors
ComicInfo.Summary:
Still having flashbacks of parochial school days? Just be thankful you weren't a student at the institute of learning in this issue! The demonic headmaster at this all-girls school wields more than a ruler and passes out more than demerits!! Working undercover as an ice-cream man, good humor Grifter's trying to get the big scoop, but he's got his hands full with whiny kids, fistfuls of dirty quarters, and a truck full of fudgesicle pops!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-17 15:21:45. [CVDB119762]
